mapper.select: select id, user_id as userId, amount, send_date as sendDate, total, unit_amount as unitAmount, stock, version, note from t_red_packet where id = #{id} for update
mapper.update: update t_red_packet set stock = stock - 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_red_packet(user_id, amount, total, unit_amount, stock, version, note) values (#{userId}, #{amount}, #{total}, #{unitAmount}, #{stock}, #{version}, #{note})
